alert.note: Alert for Athens; Morgan; Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:12AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Perry, western Morgan and north central Athens Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1211 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shawnee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Lexington, Glouster, Shawnee, Crooksville, New Straitsville, Corning, Murray City, Trimble, Hemlock, Rendville and Burr Oak State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
